Package edu.ntu.bto.control

Class ProjectControl

java.lang.Object
edu.ntu.bto.control.ProjectControl
public class ProjectControl extends Object
Control class for managing projects. ProjectControl provides functionalities to filter projects by applicant eligibility or criteria, toggle project visibility, and retrieve projects lists for various purposes.
Author:
SC2002 Assignment Group

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectControl

      public ProjectControl(List<Project> projects)
      Constructs a new ProjectControl with the given list of projects.
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of Projects to manage.

  • Method Details

    • getVisibleProjectsForApplicant

      public List<Project> getVisibleProjectsForApplicant(Applicant applicant)
      Retrieves the list of projects visible to a given applicant. Only projects that are marked visible and open to the applicant's demographic (based on marital status and age requirements) are included.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant for whom to fetch visible projects.
      Returns:
      A list of visible Projects that the applicant is eligible to view/apply for.

    • filterByNeighborhood

      public List<Project> filterByNeighborhood(List<Project> projList, String keyword)
      Filters projects by a keyword in their neighborhood.
      Parameters:
      projList - The project list
      keyword - The neighborhood keyword to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of Projects whose neighborhood contains the given keyword (case-insensitive).

    • filterByFlatType

      public List<Project> filterByFlatType(List<Project> projList, String flatType)
      Filters projects by a given flat type.
      Parameters:
      projList - The project list
      flatType - The flat type to filter by (e.g., "2-Room" or "3-Room").
      Returns:
      A list of Projects that offer the specified flat type.

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      public void toggleProjectVisibility(Project project)
      Toggles the visibility of a given project. If the project is currently visible to applicants, it will be hidden, and vice versa.
      Parameters:
      project - The Project whose visibility is to be toggled.

    • getAllProjects

      public List<Project> getAllProjects()
      Returns the list of all projects.
      Returns:
      A list of all Projects in the system.

    • getProjectsByManager

      public List<Project> getProjectsByManager(String manager)
      Retrieves all projects managed by a specific manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - The identifier (name or NRIC) of the manager.
      Returns:
      A list of Projects where the manager field matches the given identifier.
